verses.name: Daniel 2:31
verses.text: Thou, O king, sawest, and behold a great image. This great image, whose brightness was excellent, stood before thee; and the form thereof was terrible.

verses.name: Daniel 2:32
verses.text: This image’s head was of fine gold, his breast and his arms of silver, his belly and his thighs of brass,

verses.name: Daniel 2:33
verses.text: His legs of iron, his feet part of iron and part of clay.

verses.name: Daniel 2:34
verses.text: Thou sawest till that a stone was cut out without hands, which smote the image upon his feet that were of iron and clay, and brake them to pieces.
